description: Average response times for Bookinfo services under latency 1/5/10ms (Istio vs MCG).
Per-run response time samples used for variability/error bars.
No-traffic-management behavior under injected faults (E2E latency + RPS).
MCG-enabled with circuit breaker (p95 latency + RPS).
Workload spike experiment with retries/blocked requests.
CPU/memory and p95 latency comparison vs autoscaler.
